lcn.p: This is not a guide to Mindfulness for Anyone. Any guide that claims to be is either too general to suffice for all but the gifted few for whom mindfulness comes most naturally - or a collection of several guides wrapped into one enormously large one - or simply false in the claims of being for everyone. Unfortunately, the last of these possibilities is in most cases the most likely - as too many people who write on and teach such subjects underestimate the impact of human diversity on how one should approach such things as the practice of mindfulness.

This guide is also not a Revealed Document handed down from some Sage on High, but a bi-product of study on the subject written to minimize the repetition of mistakes and to maximize successful practices.
